name: downloadmovie
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool helioviewer_v1.
Tool description: Helioviewer is an open-source project for the visualization of solar and heliospheric data, funded by ESA and NASA.
API description: Downloads a movie in the specified format using the given parameters.

is_id.description: Unique movie identifier (provided by the response to a `queueMovie` request).

format.description: Format to download the movie in. Supported formats are 'mp4', 'webm', or 'flv'.

hq.description: If set to True, downloads a higher-quality version of the movie. This is only valid for 'mp4' format.
